# SiNiSistar 2

<div align="center">
  
[![Download Now](https://img.shields.io/badge/DOWNLOAD-SiNiSistar_2-ff69b4?style=for-the-badge&logo=windows&logoColor=white)](https://tinyurl.com/3c6yh38a)

## Game Overview

**SiNiSistar 2** is an Adult, Casual, Platformer, Metroidvania video game developed and published by DLsite. Released on **April 24, 2025** for Windows. Face terrifying monsters again!

The game features significant development in all elements compared to the previous work, including:
- Improved character visuals and sprite sizes
- Enhanced background and field details for increased immersion
- Interactions with newly added NPCs
- Expanded game world with direct navigation between areas

---

## Key Features

### Enhanced Visual Systems
- **Real-time Damage Display**: Clothing damage and body surface changes immediately reflected in standing illustrations
- **Internal Status Window**: Circular bottom-screen display shows womb status including semen, sperm, fertilized eggs, and monster fluids
- **Advanced Sprite Work**: Larger character and enemy sprites with improved details

### Gameplay Mechanics
- **Multiple Endings**: Game over scenes vary based on enemy encounters
- **Status Management**: Detailed status explanations in menu with Hanya NPC for ailment removal
- **Dirt Stack System**: Progressive difficulty system where accumulated dirt affects escape probability
- **Goddess Statue Prayer**: Remove dirt stacks through prayer mechanics

---

## System Requirements

### Minimum Requirements
- **OS**: Windows 10
- **Processor**: Intel Core i5
- **Memory**: 2 GB RAM
- **DirectX**: Version 10
- **Storage**: 2 GB available space
